snippet: Stan Lee, the venerated Marvel Comics writer and editor, thought he was making a quick cameo on the reality series set at Kevin Smith's New Jersey comic-book shop. But the day unfolded differently than he expected.
abstract: Stan Lee, the venerated Marvel Comics writer and editor, thought he was making a quick cameo on the reality series set at Kevin Smith's New Jersey comic-book shop. But the day unfolded differently than he expected.

headline.main: Stan Lee, Still a True Believer, Spends a Day on AMC's 'Comic Book Men'
headline.print_headline: Visit From a Real, Live Comic Book Hero
